alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Madison; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 4:09AM EST until January 06 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph above 3500 feet. * WHERE...Haywood, Madison, and Swain Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp.
